radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears somewhat echogenic, consistent with fatty change; a focal area of decreased echogenicity adjacent to the gallbladder fossa, likely focal fat sparing; gallbladder is distended and full of sludge with gallbladder wall thickening and pericholecystic fluid; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 6 mm; trace ascites may be present.
